headline: EQT (EQT): Taking a Fresh Look at Valuation as Natural Gas Fundamentals and LNG Deals Support Growth
summary: EQT (EQT) just filed a relatively small $55.17 million shelf registration tied to an employee stock ownership plan, and that move is landing against a backdrop of improving natural gas fundamentals and rising investor interest. See our latest analysis for EQT. At a latest share price of $53.87, EQT’s 90 day share price return of 9.51 percent and one year total shareholder return of 26.81 percent suggest momentum is quietly building as investors weigh stronger natural gas fundamentals, recent...

headline: How Investors May Respond To EQT (EQT) Redeeming High‑Coupon 2027 Notes To Refine Its Balance Sheet
summary: On December 19, 2025, EQT Corporation said it will redeem all US$495,925,000 of its 7.500% Senior Notes due 2027 on December 30, 2025, under the terms of the existing indenture. This move, paired with new equity registered for an ESOP and analyst focus on EQT’s role in rising natural gas demand, highlights an effort to streamline financing while supporting long-term growth plans. We’ll now examine how retiring high‑coupon debt may reshape EQT’s investment narrative around cash flow quality,...
